text: Kalapam is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film directed by Baiju Kottarakkara and starring Manoj K Jayan and Praveena in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/gallery_kalapam-.htm ==Cast== * Manoj K. Jayan as Bharathan * Siddique as S.I Muhammad Iqbal * Thilakan as Valayar Madhavan * Rajan P Dev as Vaniyamkulam Viswan * Kollam Thulasi as Mammalikutty * Sathaar as Pallipadan * Praveena as Gopika * Sagar Shiyas as Hydarali * Bheeman Raghu as Dy.SP Karippayi Anthony *M. S. Thripunithura as Krishnanunni Master * Augustine as Hindustan Sasidharan Pilla * Baiju Kottarakkara as Gafoor * Baiju Johnson as Thankachan * TS Raju as Cameo Appearance ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Kalapam
